name: Fitness World
address: Fitness World, 1214 Howe St, Vancouver, BC V6Z 1R5

featured_reviews.review_id:
Fairly friendly staff, some are more on the reserved side and don't come across as friendly but that's okay.

A great selection of equipment spread out over two huge floors. Can be a little busy at times but everyone is pretty respectful.

My five star review goes to the trainers, specifically Ryan. During my time training with Ryan he's attentive to my goals and needs and aware of minor adjustments needed to see a change in posture, stance and aesthetics. Highly recommend training with him.
featured_reviews.review_text:
Fairly friendly staff, some are more on the reserved side and don't come across as friendly but that's okay.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Saleste,
We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we're able to
make a positive difference in your fitness journey!
I know Ryan works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness
goals, so I'll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them.
Thanks again, see you in the club soon!
Jordan

featured_reviews.review_id: I had a great personal training session with Jared J here at Fitness World Howe and Davie. I highly recommend this coach he is super experienced. He knows about nutrition and how to put technique and fun together in a workout session. I was feeling the difference working out with him, his guidance was so much better than group sessions I had with coaches in the past. Another thing I like about my gym is how focused everyone is here when it comes to working out and how nice and friendly the staff is.
featured_reviews.review_text: I had a great personal training session with Jared J here at Fitness World Howe and Davie. I highly recommend this coach he is super experienced. featured_reviews.review_id:
Overall not a bad gym, except for a couple things:
1) to cancel you have to do a notice a month ahead as they don't have immediate cancellation
2) They don't like to talk about extra payment , I had a medium subscription and asked if I can use a massage chair and will it be for free as I don't remember what was included. Then the other customer came and the girl just said the number of the chair. So I thought it's all good and was extra charged later.
It's cheap and it's good for the price and quality you get.
Update: So, while I was waiting my cancellation I got x2 payment somehow

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Veronika,
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We appreciate all feedback, good or bad, as it helps us
to become an even better facility for our members.
My name's Jordan and I'm the General Manager here. Would you be able to email me at gmdowntown@fitnessworld.ca and let me
know what we could do better for you?
Thanks, and have a great day,
Jordan

featured_reviews.review_id: I joined this gym last month and I'm very happy with my decision. The gym is very nice and has all the equipment and facilities I need. The staff is very polite and helpful, especially Katy who helped me in the hassle free membership process. She was very friendly and professional and answered all my questions. I would recommend this gym to anyone who is looking for a great place to work out.
featured_reviews.review_text: I joined this gym last month and I'm very happy with my decision. The gym is very nice and has all the equipment and facilities I need. The staff is very polite and helpful, especially Katy who helped me in the hassle free membership process. She was very friendly and professional and answered all my questions. I would recommend this gym to anyone who is looking for a great place to work out.

featured_reviews.review_id: Shota and Andrew are good personal trainers! I had a couple of sessions with Shota for deadlift. it was great. I also had the chance to learn deadlift with Andrew on Member Appreciation Day. He is also good! The gym is always busy when I'm there, but it's a nice place!
featured_reviews.review_text: Shota and Andrew are good personal trainers! I had a couple of sessions with Shota for deadlift. it was great. I also had the chance to learn deadlift with Andrew on Member Appreciation Day. He is also good! The gym is always busy when I'm there, but it's a nice place!

We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we're able to

I know Shota and Andrew work super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness
goals, so I'll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them.
Thanks again, see you in the club soon!
Jordan

featured_reviews.review_id:
Not bad, but could be better. You get what you pay for.
Improvement:
1- Cleanliness: the place is very dirty, the washrooms are smelly and disgusting sometimes
2- Customer service: front desk people are bad  they have no idea how to deal with customers

I consider myself a picky customer and  sometimes I expect a lot, but personally this location performance is way below average.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Katy was very helpful, professional, courteous and solved my problem effortlessly. I am moving back to California, and needed to cancel my membership. Katy was able to work out a solution that avoided me paying out the rest of my term.

Additionally, the gym is spacious and well stocked with every possible machine and weight to effectively exercise every muscle in the body.

I am also very impressed with the trainers. I was given an assessment and a free session when I started my membership. This helped me to make great strides towards my fitness goal.

Excellent gym, great membership prices, highly recommend and if I am back in Vancouver I will definitely get another membership here!

featured_reviews.review_id: Love this gym at Downtown so far. There is so much equipment available to start you on your fitness journey. Also, there are classes available which I loved it and there are recovery machines to help you feel better.   It has a friendly and helpful staff, and cleaned constantly.
